description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; two figures dressed in black with arms extended from their sides; one figure in lower left corner and the second in the upper right of the image
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Second Scene, Plate 2 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
